bullet_text: Fixed an issue where the Executioner Monster Affix sound effect played continuously.
Fixed an issue where certain Silent Chests in Nahantu did not count towards the Season Rank objective Test of Luck.
Fixed an issue where Zagraal in the Dark Citadel didn't drop loot.
Fixed an issue where some Tower bosses had significantly more health than others.
Fixed an issue where an error would occur when trying to view the profile of a leaderboard entry and the player had a private profile.
Fixed an issue where resetting a piece of masterworked gear did not unlock the Recycled Works challenge.
Fixed an issue where the reward for defeating all the Lesser Evils at once was only given to the player who opened the chest in Local Co-op play.
Fixed an issue where other Divine Gifts could stop gaining experience if another Divine Gift was at Rank 5.
Fixed an issue where some cosmetic items would show as locked even though they were unlocked and usable.
Fixed various instances of Placeholder assets in the Wardrobe.
Various performance, stability, and audio improvements.
Tower now unlocks Tiers the same way the Pit does.
Monster populations have been tuned to be fair to both ranged and melee builds.
Bosses have been adjusted to remove unwanted behavior such as self healing and invisibility.
Boss health has been lowered to have parity with Pit Bosses.
Removed the delay between when a Pylon Cage is destroyed and when a Pylon can be used.
Pylon health has been reduced in an effort to make them less tanky.
Tuned the pylons to be more balanced to avoid unfair rolls of pylon spawn order.
Damage from 4[x] to 3[x].
Player gains a chunk of Temporary Attack Speed (+50% Attack Speed).
Player can Knockdown enemies they pass through.
Resource gain per second to support builds that drain resource which don't benefit from Cost Reduction.
Orbs drop immediately when the monster dies, and no longer wait for post-Death effects (Elite affixes like Fire enchanted, certain spiders, etc.)
If the orb drops close enough to the player, orbs will appear closer to you to avoid backtracking. If you are too far, orbs will drop at the corpse of the enemy that dropped it.
Dying will never respawn players on the previous floor.
Exit portals now spawn closer to the player at the end of a run.
Spinning hazards in certain areas in the Vault of the Crucible dungeon have been removed.
Locked Capstone Dungeons will now show on the map and display a tooltip which describes requirements to unlock.
Various updates to The Tower.
Meteors spawned by the Essence of Hellfire now only deal damage over time, and no longer deal immediate damage or Stun players hit.
When attempting to sanctify items that cannot be sanctified, you’ll now be better informed why it can’t be sanctified.
Critical Strike Damage
Bonus Damage over Time
Damage to Vulnerable enemies
Overpower Damage
Lucky Hit to Gain Resource
Fixed an issue where Paladins could become stuck while climbing.
Fixed an issue where Shield Charge could fail to hit enemies who were close to the player.
Fixed an issue where the player would get stuck in place if using Advance assigned to the right mouse button while March of the Stalwart was equipped.
Fixed an issue where the Rite of Mercy upgrade for Holy Light made Paladins untargetable by Spiritborn's Toxic Skin Passive when playing in PvP.
Fixed an issue where Falling Star with the Freefall upgrade and Rally with the Words of Sacrifice upgrade didn't generate resolve when the Aspect of Valiance was equipped.
Fixed an issue where the Aspect of Valiance could not be imprinted on the expected equipment slots.
Fixed an issue where the Strength node next to the Ironclad Rare node in the Castle Paragon Board was magic instead of normal.
Fixed an issue where the Renewal passive was granting healing instead of Fortify.
Fixed an issue where the player could go out of bounds and get stuck when casting Falling Star towards a Fog Wall.
Fixed an issue where the Screen Reader did not read the Paladin Unique Icon on items.
Fixed an issue where Spiritborn players could not use the Armory until after unlocking Spirt Halls.
Damage bonus increased from 3% to 5%, up to 40% from 24%.
Line damage increased from 140% to 200%.
Spit damage increased from 40% to 95%.
Poison damage bonus increased from 50% to 100%.
Vulnerable damage bonus increased from 80% to 100%.
Damage bonus increased from 15% to 30%.
Stacking damage bonus increased from 1% to 2%.
Poison damage bonus increased from 40% to 60%.
Damage bonus increased from 15% to 30%, up to 60% from 30%.
Fixed an issue where the Screen Reader did not properly read out buttons in the Season Rank menu.
Fixed an issue where the Hellfire Adherent boss in the Hellish Descent dungeon could leave the boss arena.
Fixed an issue where quickly leaving boss arenas after entering minor boss arenas in Capstone Dungeons could allow players to circumvent the encounters.
Fixed an issue where the Leave Dungeon ability could teleport the player back to the first floor of Vault of the Crucible instead of outside the Dungeon.
Fixed an issue where enemies could endlessly spawn in the second floor of the Enclave of Darkness.
Fixed an issue where teleporting via the world map to the Hellish Descent dungeon took the player to the wrong location.
Fixed an issue where the Guardian's Lair Portal in The Pit could spawn in an unreachable location.
Fixed an issue where Belial could be damaged before he fully spawned in The Pit.
Fixed an issue where Druid players could not use the Armory until they unlocked Spirt Boons.
Fixed an issue where previously earned renown rewards for extra potion charges still applied for some players.
Fixed an issue where Elite Monsters with the Soul Drinker Affix could scale indefinitely, becoming extremely large and eventually unkillable. Who knew drinking souls could be so good for bulking?
Fixed an issue where sometimes mounts would fail to break through barriers when using Spur.
Fixed an issue where Greater Affixes would lose their unique colored text after being upgraded through Masterworking.
Fixed an issue where the Boss Health Bar would be duplicated after it revived when fighting the Entwined Souls in Enclave of Darkness.
Fixed an issue where Toughness did not display properly when comparing items.
Fixed an issue where the visual effect for the Poison Enchanted affix could persist after the damaging effect was complete.
Fixed an issue where players on controller could accidentally re-summon Azmodan when trying to collect loot after defeating him.
Various stability, performance, UI, and visual improvements.
Updated descriptions and tooltips for Heavenly Sigils so the requirements for sanctifying an item are clearer.
The Season Rank objective for clearing Pit Tier 40 has been changed to now require a Pit Tier 35 clear instead.
Various UI consistency and clarity improvements for Sanctification and Season Rank.
An audio cue has been added to further bring attention to the safe zones in the Vault of the Crucible Capstone Dungeon.
The altar to summon Azmodan has additional info added to the tooltip to better explain the requirements for summoning Azmodan.
Fixed an issue where Paladins could not get a Strength affix from Sanctification.
Fixed an issue where the Extra Damage for Justice Skills Tempering affix didn't apply properly.
Fixed an issue where the damage increase from Judgement Consumption granted by Virtuous Charge didn't properly apply.
Fixed an issue where Arbiter of Justice did not benefit from Reach of the Law when Judgement of Uriel was equipped.
Fixed an issue where the Seraph's Wings upgrade for Arbiter of Justice granted higher than intended movement speed.
Fixed an issue where the Resolve Stacks from the Aspects of Dominance and Valiance could fall off randomly.
Fixed an issue where the gauge meter for Arbiter of Justice could stop draining, even though the buff itself reduced properly.
Fixed an issue where Runes for the Paladin could not be randomly crafted at the Jeweler.
Fixed an issue where the initial questline to go through Kurast Undercity couldn't be completed for players in the eternal realm.
Fixed an issue where the Paladin quest, Call of the Paladin could have progression blocked if the associated monsters were slain by nearby NPCs.
Fixed an issue where the Herald of Hatred pet would often turn unstoppable and run away from the player.
Fixed an issue where the objective to Speak to Sihek during the Deeds of a Champion quest would shift the quest pin location incorrectly.
Various fixes and improvements to consistency, accuracy, and clarity for tooltips, descriptions, and icons for the Paladin.
Fixed an issue where the Screen Reader did not read all information in the Ensembles Tab in the Wardrobe.
Fixed an issue where the boss in the Hellish Descent could fully reset if the player entered specific locations in the boss arena.
Fixed an issue where the player could get stuck between the wall and the barrier in Enclave of Darkness.
Fixed an issue where the player respawned at the previous floor when dying during the boss encounter in Enclave of Darkness.
Fixed an issue where Azmodan's demon gate attack could spawn outside the boss arena in Breach of Sin.
Fixed an issue where monsters could infinitely spawn in Breach of Sin.
Fixed an issue where monsters spawned by Animus Carriers also dropped Animus.
Fixed an issue where Tortured Gifts failed to respawn if Helltide re-appeared in the same region where it was previously.
Fixed an issue where access to Divine Gifts could be lost when playing in Local Co-Op.
Fixed an issue where Meteors spawned by the Essence of Hellfire could reflect Thorns damage back onto the player.
Fixed an issue where the Sanctification Affix for adding quality could malfunction.
Fixed an issue where Sorcerer's Flame Shield Enchantment would fail to activate if Flame Shield was equipped to the Skill Bar and Orsivane was equipped.
Fixed an issue where the visual and audio effects for the Essence of Squalor Divine Gift persisted in town.
Fixed an issue where the Spectral Shiver Cosmetic bundle would be missing even if it was properly owned.
Fixed an issue where the Leaderboard was viewable, despite having no entries there.
Fixed an issue where tempering Legendary Ancestral Armor required more material types than intended.
Fixed an issue where the Resolute Defender Challenge could be unlocked when not playing as a Paladin.
Various stability, UI, visual, performance, and audio improvements.
Upgrading an affix to a Greater Affix can now also occur on non-ancestral items.
Affixes on Ancestral Unique or Mythic Items can no longer be replaced.
Indestructible affix replaced by adding 5-25 Quality ranks.
To sanctify an item, it only needs to have an item power of 750 or higher in Torment difficulties, rather than being Ancestral.
Affix ranges have been adjusted across the board. In general, affix values have been increased, and ranges have been narrowed, and some affixes now have a higher maximum.
Additional Legendary powers have been added.
Reduced item quality rewards in pre-Torment difficulties.
Bonus experience from the maggots in Helltide has been adjusted.
Glyph Upgrades now get a scaling chance to grant an extra upgrade attempt based on Divine Gift rank. Rank 1 grants a 25% chance, up to a 100% upgrade chance at Rank 5.
Purified Gifts now grant 2 levels instead of one.
Andariel no longer regenerates Health if you die.
Andariel's phase transition is now much quicker.
The size of Belial's eyeballs has been increased to make them easier to target.
Belial's death now takes less time to finish.
Shrines no longer disappear when fighting Azmodan.
Azmodan has been granted resilience to bring him more in line with other World Bosses.
Lesser Evil events in the Overworld now reward unique items from Lair Boss reward pools.
Lucky Hit gain resource reduced from 66% to 22%.
Primary resource generation reduced to 50%.

Previous (PTR): Each point in your Primary Stat increases your Primary Resource by 3% but you have 75% reduced life. Any damage you would take is dealt to your Primary Resource before your life. If you have not taken damage in 6 seconds, your Resource regenerates to full over 3 seconds.
Now: Damage is dealt to your Primary Resource before Life and damage taken this way is drastically reduced. Your Primary Resource is doubled but Maximum Life is reduced by 75%.
Damage per 10 points of Strength increased from 1% to 1.1%.
Width of the hitbox has been doubled.
Reverted Fury cap from PTR.
Adjusted attack speed scaling.
Now increases maximum Fury, up to 100.
Fury generation per enemy hit increased from 3% to 10%, up to 10 stacks.
Previous: While above 55-40 Fury, you are Berserk, but 2 Fury Drains per second.
Now: While above 50 Fury, deal 10-30%x increased damage and gain Berserking, but 3 Fury Drains per second.
The shorter cooldown for the last Brawling skill used before re-enabling all of them now scales based on attack speed.
Blood Pool bonus damage no longer only applies to the casting player.
Increased damage increased from 45%[x] to 60%[x].
Increased damage increased from 45%[x] to 60%[x].
Increased damage increased from 30%[x] to 45%[x].
Increased damage increased from 20%[x] to 25%[x].
Increased Critical Strike Damage increased from 30%[x] to 45%[x].
Increased damage to Injured and Healthy increased from 30%[x] to 45%[x].
Maximum Damaging Reduction from Fortify increased from 10% to 15%.
Affixes Removed: Damage while War Cry is Active.
No longer available.
Resource Generations with Two-Handed Bludgeoning Weapons
Resource Generations with Dual Wielded Weapons
Resource Generations with Two-Handed Slashing Weapons
Lucky Hit chance for the channeled damage increased from 2% to 6%.
Cooldown reduced from 50 to 35 seconds.
Duration increased from 10 to 12 seconds.
Damage Reduction increased from 20% to 30%.
Previous: You gain 30%[+] increased Armor while Grizzly Rage is active.
Now: Cooldown reduced by 10 seconds.
Damage against immobilized enemies increased from 15%[x] to 25%[x].
Critical Strike Damage increased from 15%[x] to 20%[x].

Previous: The duration of Grizzly Rage is increased by 3-10 seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while Grizzly Rage is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by 10%[x] for the duration, up to maximum of 200%[x].
Now: Critical Strikes while in Grizzly Rage increases your damage by 3%[x] for 60 seconds, up to 120%[x].
Changed to Aspect of the Rabid Beast.
Previous: While Grizzly Rage is active, your direct damage is converted into Poison damage, you deal x[40 - 80]% more Poison damage, and you passively spread Rabies.
Now: Deal 40-80%[x] more Poison Damage. While Shapeshifted, your direct damage is converted into Poison damage.

Previous (PTR): Damaging [200 - 100] Enemies with Storm Skills grants a charge. Casting any Defensive Skill will grant Max Movement Speed and Unhindered for 1 second for each charge used. While Charged, enemies you run into are Immobilized for 1 second.
Now: Damaging 150-100 Enemies with Nature Magic Skills grants Max Movement Speed and Unhindered for 4-8 seconds. Enemies you run through are Immobilized for 1 second.
Movement Speed Affix replaced with 1-2 ranks of Endless Tempest.
Previous: Your Earth Skills deal 10%[x] increased Critical Strike Damage, increased by 20%[x] of your Damage vs Crowd Controlled bonus, up to 60%[x].
Now: Your Earth Skills deal 70%[x] increased Critical Strike Damage.
Previous: Nature Magic Skills deal 35%[x] increased damage to Poisoned enemies. Lucky Hit: Nature Magic Skills have up to a 40% chance to Poison the enemy for 800% damage over 4 seconds.
Now: Deal 40%[x] increased damage to Poisoned enemies. Lucky Hit: Nature Magic Skills have up to a 40% chance to Poison the enemy for 1000% damage over 4 seconds.
Digitigrade Gait
Attack Speed increased by 25%.
Reverted Essence cap from PTR.
Removed the requirement for controlling 7 or more Minions.
Timer for Overpower reduced from 15 to 10 seconds.
Barrier reduced from 1-8% to 1-3% of Maximum Health.
Consuming a Corpse now contributes 3 souls to Vampiric Curse, up from 1.
Damage bonus increased from 15-25% to 20-30% per soul.
Damage increased from 40-80% to 60-120% of weapon damage.
Blood Lance Damage increased from 10-40% to 30-60%.
Damage increased from 520-900% to 650-1100% of weapon damage.
Bone Golem's combo attack of two swings now counts as a single attack for the purposes of Ring of Mendeln, rather than two separate attacks.
Resource Generation with Two-Handed Weapons.
Resource Generation while Wielding a Shield.
Damage scaling per 10 points of Dexterity increased from 1.1% to 1.25%.
Healing reduced from 10% to 6%.
Healing per Rank reduced from 1% to .5% of Maximum Health.
Damage increased from 10-30% to 20-40%.
Damage increased from 100-120% to 100-140%.
Reverted Energy cap from PTR.
Chance to deal triple damage to Knocked Down enemies increased from 50-75% to 50-100%.
Bonus damage increased from 35-55% to 50-70%.
Bonus damage increased from 70-100% to 70-130%.
Ranks to Stutter Step
No longer available.
Adjusted the description to specify that it invokes Teleport and doesn't Cast it.
Previous (PTR): Teleport Dazes enemies at its end point for 1.5 seconds.
Now: You gain 25%[+] All Resistance for 3 seconds after Teleporting.
Previous: Casting a Skill grants 3%[+] All Resistance and 2%[+] Maximum Resistance to that Skill's Element for 9 seconds.
Now: Casting a Skill grants 3%[+] All Resistance and 5%[+] Resistance to that Skill's Element for 9 seconds.
Maximum Barrier reduced from 30% to 20% of Maximum Health.
Barrier per Rank reduced from 10% to 5% of Maximum Health.
Healing reduced from 1% per Rank to .2% of Maximum Health.
Healing from Bosses reduced from 4% to 2% of Maximum Health.
Barrier reduced from 3-6% to 1.5-3% of Maximum Health.
Reverted Mana cap from Season of Infernal Chaos.
Teleport's Cooldown reduction increased from 1-2.5 to 3-4.5 seconds.
Previous: When you Freeze an enemy there is a [25-45%] chance they become Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
New: Frost Skills deal 20-30%x increased damage and have a 40% chance to apply Vulnerable for 4 seconds.
Previous (PTR): Casting Teleport grants a stack of Galvanization, increasing its damage by 30-50% for 8 seconds. Becoming Injured Teleports you to a random location.
Now: Each enemy hit by Teleport increases the damage by 5-15%|x| and reduces the Cooldown by 0.5 seconds of the next cast. Becoming Injured will Teleport you to a random location.
Previous (PTR): After Casting Teleport, Close enemies are Pulled Inwards and it has a 10-30% chance to reset from each enemy it kills.
Now: Teleport pulls Close enemies to you and grants 10-30% Damage Reduction.
Ranks to Elemental Attunement replaced with All Resistance.
Ranks to Shocking Impact replaced with 30-40% Teleport CDR.
Ranks to Conduction
Frost Critical Strike Chance
Reverted Vigor cap from PTR.
Now reduces the time to recharge charges by 5 seconds.
Previous: Gain Life On Kill equal to 5% of your Maximum Life while you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity.
Now: Gain 1-181 (depending on level) Life On Hit while you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity.
Previous (PTR): Gain 2/4/6% Jaguar Attack Speed and Cooldown Reduction.
Now: Jaguar Skills deal 6/12/18%[x] increased direct damage to up to 3 of the Closest enemies to you.
Barrier reduced from 25% to 15% of Maximum Health.
Reverted Vigor cap from PTR.
Dodge chance changed to Dexterity.
Maximum quality is now 25, up from 20.
Quality increase per Masterwork is now 2-5, up from 1-3.
Quality upgrades now increase all affix values by 1% per quality value.
The boosted affix will be colored differently to highlight it.
Item Quality 0: 10 Obducite
Item Quality 5: 25 Obducite
Item Quality 15: 66 Obducite
Item Quality 25: 100 Obducite
There is now a chance a tempered affix gets applied as a Greater Affix.
Resource gain Tempering affixes have been added for Helms and Rings.
Resource per second Tempering affix added for Pants.
Adjusted Tempering Recipes to remove affixes from Class-specific Manuals that were extraneous due to existing in Generic Manuals, or unused.
Movement Speed changed from 16-25% to 15-25%.
Movement Speed After Killing an Elite increased from 20-22.5% to 25-45%.
Maximum Life increased from 84-141 to 349-450.
Thorns increased from 45-70 to 211-281.
Casting Ultimate Skills Restores Primary Resource.
When comparing items, the Armor or resistance difference between items will now display as percentage of Toughness difference instead of just displaying the flat Armor difference.
Toughness is now displayed in the Character Stats window.
The Toughness tooltip now breaks down Damage Resistance per damage type.
Torment difficulties now display a recommended Toughness amount when selecting difficulty.
Fortify and Barrier Generation are now a part of the general defensive pool of affixes that can appear on items.
Monsters in the open world no longer scale 1:1 with your level, it is now offset so the player scales better than monsters.
Monsters damage has been reduced at low levels.
Monster power has been tuned down slightly in early Torment tiers.
Base Health for boss monsters has been increased.
The chance for items with multiple Greater Affixes to drop has been increased in Torment tiers.
More items now drop from levels 1-15.
When in a Capstone dungeon, the closest affiliated difficulty is now displayed.
Cooldown Reduction can now naturally appear on rings, gloves, and shields.
Various tuning to Capstone Dungeon encounters.
Various monster and monster pack spawning adjustments.
Various other minor updates and tweaks to Sanctification and Seasonal Activities.
Fixed an issue where Duriel maggots spawned in Helltide spawned experience motes at inappropriate times.
Fixed an issue where the Luminary in Unseen Awakening didn't respawn after the player died.
Fixed an issue where Sweltering Heat in the Torrid Menagerie could cause the player to damage themself.
Fixed an issue where the Leave Dungeon action didn't take the player out of the Dungeon when in the Torrid Menagerie.
Fixed an issue where the Sins of the Many Capstone dungeon could not be exited without logging out.
Fixed an issue where if you defeated Belial when he appeared after defeating Varshan, he wouldn't drop items as expected.
Fixed an issue where the unavoidable blood orb explosions in the second phase of the Echo of Lilith fight dealt more damage than intended.
Fixed an issue where monsters could stop spawning unexpectedly in Kor Dragan Stronghold.
Fixed an issue where the last enemy could fail to spawn to complete the Enroaching Thickets objective in the Raethwind Wilds.
Fixed an issue where having the objective to defeat the Blood Maiden was impossible to complete due to Duriel replacing the Blood Maiden in Helltide.
Fixed an issue where some bosses could fail to spawn if the player was in stealth when the boss was supposed to spawn.
Fixed an issue where monsters with the Illusory affix could spawn monsters with the Life-Link affix that could then be killed instantly.
Fixed an issue in multiple dungeons where only one instance of animus needed to be collected before the dungeon could be progressed.
Fixed an issue where progression through Escalating Nightmare Dungeons could be blocked by teleport effects.
Fixed an issue where some monsters could deal more damage than expected.
Fixed an issue where some Nightmare Dungeon Affixes could remain active outside of the dungeon.
Fixed an issue where the cost for enchanting an item at the Occultist was not consistent for all two-handed weapons.
Fixed an issue where the material cost for Masterworking was displayed inaccurately.
Fixed an issue where the Damage Per Second value was inconsistently displayed between the Masterworking tab and the weapon itself.
Fixed an issue where Items salvaged for far more materials than intended.
Fixed an issue where Soulbrand Unique did not give the correct amount of Barrier.
Fixed an issue where the Feo rune would reset its cooldown when swapping weapons.
Fixed an issue where Attack Speed could appear as an affix on a Two-Handed weapon through enchantment.
Fixed multiple instances of Paragon node bonus effects not being properly being granted.
Fixed multiple instances where items had the incorrect values of elemental resistances.
Fixed an issue where Heavenly Sigils could fail to be consumed when Sanctifying an item.
Fixed an issue where Strategic Rallying Cry did not show the accurate amount of Life gained.
Fixed an issue where Ugly Bastard Helm did not have the appropriate amount of Fire Resistance.
Fixed an issue where the Brash Node no longer granted resistances as a bonus.
Fixed an issue where the Yul rune was not triggered by Ground Stomp if Chainscourged Mail was equipped.
Fixed an issue where Ramaladni's Magnum Opus was active even when the active skill wasn't using the weapon.
Fixed an amount where the Fury cost for Kick was incorrect.
Fixed an issue where Preserving Earthen Bulwark was granting the incorrect amount of Fortify.
Fixed an issue where Ancestral Fortitude didn't increase non-physical resistance.
Fixed an issue where the Movement Speed buff from Khamsin Steppewalkers could be permanently granted when casting two defensive skills in a row.
Fixed an issue where the description for the buff from Khamsin Steppewalkers displayed the wrong values.
Fixed an issue where the description for Grizzly Rage didn't properly display the damage increase for adding additional skill points.
Fixed an issue where Golems were not properly smaller while in town while using Gravebloom.
Fixed an issue where Rapid Ossification passive was not granting cooldown reduction for more than 100 Essence at a time.
Fixed an issue where Sacrificing Defenders did not provide the bonus Elemental resistances as intended.
Fixed an issue where Paranormal Sever would occasionally fail to apply Vulnerable and Fear.
Fixed an issue where the tempering affix for Dance of Knives to deal Double damage could stack to deal incredibly high values.
Fixed an issue where the Teleport Enchantment tooltip was showing the wrong cooldown.
Fixed an issue where the Oculus could randomly teleport the player while they are healing.
Fixed an issue where the Antivenom Passive was not functioning.
Fixed an issue where the Jaguar Main Hall would not benefit from Aspect of Unyielding Hits.
Fixed an issue where Ravager would dash to targets uncontrollably when non-Casted core skills were invoked.
Fixed an issue where the Eagle Primary Spirit Hall's damage was being increased far more than intended by bonuses to Spirit Hall Potency, such as from Wushe Nak Pa.
Fixed an issue where Mystic Circle would be empowered by skills that were not cast, such as from Path of the Emissary.
Fixed an issue where The Protector did not smash immediately upon landing.
Fixed an issue where Tempering an item would prevent selecting other items that could also apply that affix from being slotted into the tempering window.
Fixed an issue where the World Map could not be viewed while inside a Capstone dungeon.
Fixed an issue where the visual indicatorfor Fortify could be higher than the actual Fortify amount.
Fixed an issue where the quest to Masterwork an item was not completed when Masterworking an item.
Fixed an issue where abilities could be used and combat was allowed in the Heavenly Forge. (Gentlemen, you can’t fight in here this is the War Room!)
Fixed an issue where Champions didn't behave like Elites in various contexts, such as not dropping the expected kind of loot.
Fixed an issue where Undercity tributes weren't dropping as expected.
Fixed an issue where sometimes the Undercity could not be accessed when it should be.
Fixed an issue where some bosses granted more experience than intended.
Fixed an issue where Torment could not be unlocked until reaching level 60.
Various miscellaneous fixes to new features and systems introduced in this Season.
Various stability, UI, and visual improvements.
+30% Movement Speed (Inherent)
+16-25% Movement speed
+155-200% Core Skill damage
+1-2 Core Skill ranks
+26.5-40% Impairment Reduction
Every 12-4 meters you move, invoke a Core Skill from your primary Spirit Hall.
Lord Zir
Damage increased from 80% to 160%.
Previous: When enemies recover from Concussive Stomp, you dodge their next 3 attacks.
Now: When enemies recover from a Concussive Stomp that you Cast, you block their next 3 attacks.
Now consumes up to 500 Vigor.
Previous: Hitting enemies with Jaguar Skills increases the Damage they take from you by 0.1-0.3% up to 10-30%.
Now: Gain 2/4/6% Jaguar Skill Attack Speed and Cooldown Reduction.
Previous: Your Maximum Vigor is increased by 50%, and killing an enemy grants you 1 - 7 Vigor. While you have Ferocity, your Poisoning effects deal their damage across 33% of the normal duration.
Now: Your Maximum Vigor is increased by 50%, and killing an enemy grants you 1 - 7 Vigor. While you have Ferocity, your new Poisoning effects last 33% longer.
Previous: A Pestilent Swarm spawns from you every 4 seconds, dealing x Poison damage per hit. Your Pestilent Swarms now orbit around you and generate 3 Vigor per hit.

Now: A Pestilent Swarm spawns from you every 4 seconds, dealing x Poison damage per hit. Your Pestilent Swarms now orbit around you and reduce an equipped Eagle Skill's cooldown by 0.25 seconds per hit.
Previous: While you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity, you gain 1 - 7 Vigor per second. Gaining Ferocity also grants Resolve.
Now: While you have at least 4 stacks of Ferocity, you gain 5-15%[x] increased damage and Armor. Gaining Ferocity also grants Resolve.
Max Life percentage has been replaced with additive Max Life.
Critical Strike Chance replaced with Resolve generation rate.
Can now only consume up to 500 Vigor.
Damage Reduction affix replaced with Dexterity affix.
Damage Reduction affix replaced with Dexterity affix.
Damage Reduction from Poisoned Enemies affix replaced with Armor affix.
Armor percentage affix replaced with All Resistance affix.
Damage Reduction while Injured affix replaced with Dexterity affix.
Damage Reduction while Standing Still affix replaced with Armor affix.
All main Spirit Hall potency affixes changed to main Spirit Hall Damage.
Updated the tooltips to display the damage that scales with the above affix in blue.

Previous: Every 15th time you deal direct damage to an enemy with a Jaguar Skill, unleash additional slashes dealing 20% of the damage you have dealt to them in the last 0.5 seconds. All Skills are now also Jaguar Skills.

Now: Every 15th time you deal direct damage with a Jaguar Skill, unleash a Beast Strike for (100% Weapon damage), increasing all damage you deal by 3% and doubling Beast Strike's damage, stacking 5 times. You lose all stacks when you stop attacking for 1 second.
Now scales damage rather than Vulnerable duration.
Now only scales Thorns damage.
Barrier per hit reduced from 5% to 2.5%.
No longer has a cap of 30% Barrier.
Updated the tooltip to clarify that Gorilla skills do not need to be Cast to gain the effect.
Now scales damage rather than Slow and Damage reduction.
Damage Reduction per stack increased from 2% to 4%.
Increased the debuff duration from 6 to 8 seconds.
Increased the total poison amount from 70% to 160%.
Fixed the tooltip to clarify it invokes a free Concussive stomp rather than Casting.
Vigor Restoration changed from 15% to 15 Vigor.
Mystic Circle Potency moved from Jaguar Finesse (Offensive) to Plains Augments (Weapon).
Fortify reduced from 5% to .2% of Maximum Life.
Required attacks increased from 3 to 20.
Healing increased from 5% to 8% of Maximum Life.
Seeker perk changed from restoring 50% Maximum Resource to 50 primary resource gained.
Healing reduced from 2% to 1% of Maximum Health.
Ember's Gift resource gain changed from 33% of max per second to 33 resource per second.
Significantly increased Tribute of Pride's legendary item rewards.
Significantly increased Tribute of Mystique's magic rune rewards.
Increased the quality from Magic to Rare and reduced the drop chance of Tribute of Pride.
Increased the quality from Magic to Rare and reduced the drop chance of Tribute of Mystique.
Significantly increased the potency of Tribute of Growth's experience rewards before Level 60.
Significantly increased Tribute of Refinement's Obducite rewards.
Significantly increased Tribute of Radiance's ancestral legendary rewards.
Buffed item rewards from any Undercity run in Torment difficulty.
Increased the potency of experience orbs that spawn from any Undercity run before level 60.
The chance to find pre-torment Tributes has been reduced.
Fixed an issue where the rank 5 Protector Thorns damage bonus was being applied less than intended.
Fixed an issue where Touch of Death didn't spawn a swarm if the target was killed by the initial strike damage.
Fixed an issue where Poised Touch of Death did not get applied when a Core Skill hit twice.
Fixed an issue where the Convergency Legendary Node didn't scale properly with the Canny Glyph's legendary bonus.
Fixed an issue where the Drive Paragon Node could scale damage higher than intended.
Fixed an issue where the Unyielding Hits Aspect didn't increase the damage of the Centipede Main Hall effect as expected.
Fixed an issue where Hesha E Kesungi would display as having one more Greater Affix than it had.
Fixed an issue where Aspect of Fleet Wings could occasionally not grant Unhindered.
Fixed an issue where Aspect of Fleet Wings could snapshot the damage buff from Unrestrained Power.
Fixed an issue where bonus Armor and Thorns gained from the Bruiser's Aspect did not display while in town.
Fixed an issue where Xal Rune would occasionally not properly maintain your current Life percentage when it triggered.
Fixed an issue where Moni Rune would reset its counter when Weapon Swapping.
Fixed an issue where Jah rune's Teleport would Teleport you in a random direction while using The Oculus.
Fixed an issue where Subo's Bargaining Chips passive did not properly increase Overpower damage.
Fixed an issue where Subo's Ambusher Passive did not properly grant bonus Lucky Hit Chance.
Fixed an issue where Subo's Loaded Munitions did not consistently apply Vulnerable.
Fixed an issue where instances of Raze the Effigies and Cull the Wicked events couldn’t be completed in some Nahantu areas.
Fixed an issue where Ehecatl would disappear upon casting a Lightning Totem during the Bonded Destiny Quest.
Fixed an issue where Undercity portals could fail to open when using certain Tribute and Bargain combinations.
Fixed an issue where Darm The Bloom Warden in Chakhir wouldn't engage in combat with the player.

For each Defensive Skill not on your Action Bar, you deal 20-40% increased damage and gain its associated Enchantment effect.
Previous: Gain 60 Maximum Resource. When taking damage, 75% is Drained as 2 Resource for every 1% of Maximum Life you would have lost.

Now: Damage is dealt to your Primary Resource before Life and damage taken this way is drastically reduced. Your Primary Resource is doubled but Maximum Life is reduced by 75%. Each point in your Primary Stat increases your Primary Resource by 3%[+] but you have 75% reduced life. Any damage you would take is dealt to your Primary Resource before your life. If you have not taken damage in 6 seconds, your Resource regenerates to full over 3 seconds.

Now: Kick is now also a Core Skill. If Kick damages an enemy, it consumes up to 500 Fury and deals an additional 25%[x] damage per 20 Fury spent. Kick no longer Knocks Back enemies.

Now: Steel yourself, increasing only your Maximum Life by 30% and gaining a Barrier that absorbs 80% of your missing Life for 5 seconds.

Now: Ground Stomp generates 60 Fury and Pulls in enemies.

Now: While Rallying Cry is active, gain 1% Maximum Life as Fortify every second.

Now: Whirlwind's Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage are increased by 6-10%[x] for each second it is channeled, up to 28-50%[x]. This bonus persists for 5 seconds after Whirlwind ends.

Now: Hemorrhage grants 1% of your Maximum Life as Fortify, and has a 3% chance to Fortify you for 100% of your Maximum Life.

Previous: Blood Wave is additionally a Bone Skill. It spawns a Bone Prison at its end point and increases your Blood Skill damage by 20-40% for 8 seconds when Cast. All Bone Spears are additionally Blood Skills. Your Bone Spears consume a Corpse to launch another Bone Spear and drain 10% of your Maximum Life.

Now: Attack enemies to fill your Inner Sight gauge. Marked enemies fill it faster. When full, restore 300 Energy, and gain 100% Energy Cost Reduction, 25%[+] Critical Strike Chance, and 25%[x] Critical Strike Damage.

Dance of Knives damage increased by 30% per Combo Point spent.

Now: Teleport generates 3 Charges of Crackling Energy.

Now: Teleport Dazes enemies at its end point for 1.5 seconds.
Chill amount reduced from 9% to 5%.

Now: Frozen Orb's explosion deals 50% more damage.
Now restores 20 mana per enemy instead of 10% per enemy.
Now restores 200 mana instead of fully restoring mana when hitting a boss.
Previous: Gain a stacking bonus for each active Summon, up to 10 stacks: 2/4/6% Summon Damage, 2/4/6% Movement Speed, 4/8/12% Mana Regeneration.
Now: Gain 6/12/18% Summon Damage.
Changed from an Offensive to a Defensive Aspect.
Renamed to Aspect of Tenuous Survival.
Previous: Deal 30-50% increased damage while you have no Defensive Skills on your Action Bar.
Now: Gain 100-600 increased Armor and Heal 5% Maximum Life a second while you have no Defensive Skills on your Action Bar.
Previous: Gain 5-20% Movement Speed. This bonus is tripled if you haven't used a Defensive Skill in the last 8 seconds.
Now: Gain 20-80% Movement Speed. This bonus is removed for 10 seconds after you Cast any Defensive Skill.
Previous: Casting Ice Armor makes you Unstoppable and grants 25% Damage Reduction for 3.5-5.5 seconds.
Now: Ice Armor makes you Unstoppable and grants 200-400 Armor.
Previous: Gain the Flame Shield Enchantment for free. When Flame Shield activates, Meteorites fall around you dealing Fire damage.
Now: While Flame Shield is active, Meteorites cascade around you and deal Fire damage. Your Meteorites gain 2% Lucky Hit Chance.
Now has 21 ranks, up from 16.
Now has 21 ranks, up from 16.
Previous: Attacks reduce Evade's Cooldown by 1 second. Gain 1 Evade Charge.
Now: 55% Teleport Nova Size.
Previous: Gain the effect of the Teleport Enchantment for free. When you Evade using Teleport Enchantment you are taken to a random location.

Now: Each enemy hit by Teleport increases the damage by 5-15%|x| and reduces the Cooldown by 0.5 seconds of the next cast. Casting Teleport grants a stack of Galvanization, increasing its damage by 30-50% for 8 seconds. Becoming Injured Teleports you to a random location.
Ranks of Primordial Binding changed to 2-4 Skill Ranks of Frozen Orb.

Previous: Casting Frozen Orb has a 35-65% chance to spawn a random Conjuration on your Action Bar when it explodes. Lucky Hit: Your Conjurations have up to a 50-90% chance to launch a Frozen Orb at Nearby enemies.

Now: Frozen Orbs deal 4-8% more damage per active Summon and have a 65% chance to create a random Conjuration when Cast. Lucky Hit: Your Summons have up to a 90% chance to launch a Frozen Orb at a Nearby enemy.
Previous: After using Teleport, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for 2-3 seconds, but Teleport's Cooldown is increased by 20%.
Now: After Casting Teleport, Close enemies are Pulled Inwards and it has a 10-30% chance to reset from each enemy it kills.
Resource Generation and Maximum affix replaced with Resource Generation.
Damage Reduction affix replaced with Intelligence affix.
Damage Reduction for each Active Ball Lightning affix replaced with Intelligence.
Damage Reduction per Crackling Energy charge affix replaced with Cooldown Reduction affix.
Inherent Maximum Cold Resistance affix removed.
Inherent Cold Resistance affix increased to 300.
Previous: Upon getting hit, you have a 5% chance to apply Ice Armor.
Now: Healing Potions apply Ice Armor and have a 25% chance to refund themselves.
Previous: Lucky Hit: Your Conjuration Skills have up to a 35% chance to unleash a Frost Nova when hitting enemies.
Now: Lucky Hit: Up to a 10% chance to unleash a Frost Nova after hitting an enemy.
Previous: Evade is replaced with a short range Teleport on a 17 second Cooldown. This version does not make you Unstoppable.
Now: Evade becomes a Teleport with a 5 second Cooldown that cannot be reduced.
Previous: Whenever you Cast a non-Basic Skill, you have a 30% chance to launch a Frozen Orb at a Nearby enemy.
Now: Casting a Skill has a 30% chance to launch a Frozen Orb at a Nearby enemy.
Dungeon and Overworld content have had their Elite densities adjusted to compensate for the new rarities of Champion and Rare.
For more details on Monster changes, please see the section above.
Normal Items will continue dropping for longer while leveling.
Magic Items will more frequently have a bonus affix.
Rare Items will be rarer before Level 30.
The legendary rate for a Level 40 character in season 11 will be equivalent to the legendary rate for a level 25 character in season 10.
The legendary rate is unchanged for a Level 60 character.
Legendary Items have an additional Affix for a total of 4.
Killing the last Champion in a pack, or any Elite, will always drop equipment and gold, in addition to their standard reward chances.
In addition to dropping Gem Fragments, Monsters have a chance of dropping a level-appropriate Gem.
Altars of Lilith no longer grant permanent character rewards, such as stat increases or Paragon points.
Instead, discovering a statue for the first time will award a small amount of gem fragments, obols, and gold.
Material costs no longer scale with Item Power. Gold cost has remained unchanged.
Eternal-only conversion recipes for legacy materials will no longer appear for seasonal character.
Enrich Scrap: Convert Rawhide and Iron Chunks into Veiled Crystals.
Refine Materials: Convert Veiled Crystals into Forgotten Souls or Legendary Salvage.
Material cost for Imprinting has been adjusted.
Rare: 5-10 Common Salvage (Iron Chunk, Silver Ore/Superior Leather, Rawhide), 3-7 Veiled Crystals, 0-3 Legendary Salvage (Abstruse Sigil/Baleful Fragment/Coiling Ward), and 5,000-200,000 gold.
Ancestral Legendary: 25 Common Salvage, 15 Veiled Crystals, 8 Legendary Salvage, 5 Forgotten Souls, and 325,000 gold.
Rare: 5 Veiled Crystals and 5,000-200,000 gold.
Ancestral Legendary: 5 Forgotten Souls and 1,000,000 gold.
Material cost for Enchanting has been adjusted.
Rare: 5-10 Common Salvage, 2-5 Veiled Crystals, and scaling (with re-rolls) gold.
Ancestral Legendary: 30 Common Salvage, 20 Veiled Crystals, 2 Legendary Salvage, 5 Forgotten Souls, and scaling(with re-rolls) gold.
Rare: 10 Veiled Crystals and scaling (with re-rolls) gold.
Ancestral Legendary: 10 Forgotten Souls and scaling (with re-rolls) gold.
Yields for Item Salvage have been adjusted.
Salvaging a Rare item provides 1 Common Salvage (Iron Chunk, Silver Ore/Superior Leather, Rawhide) and 2 Veiled Crystals.
Salvaging an Ancestral Legendary Item provides 10 Common Salvage, 10 Veiled Crystals, and 10 Legendary Salvage (Abstruse Sigil/Baleful Fragment/Coiling Ward).
Salvaging a Mythic Unique provides 100 Common Salvage, 100 Veiled Crystals, 100 Legendary Salvage, and a Resplendent Spark.
Salvaging a Rare item provides 5 Common Salvage and 2 Veiled Crystals.
Salvaging an Ancestral Legendary Item provides 5 Legendary Salvage and 1 Forgotten Soul.
Salvaging a Mythic Unique provides 1,000 legendary Salvage, 100 Forgotten Souls, and a Resplendent Spark.
Tempering has been redesigned. Instead of randomly gaining an affix from the desired Temper Manual, any learned temper affix can be selected specifically and rolled onto the item.
The number of Temper rolls available on an item has changed.
Previous: 5 Tempers
Now: 1 Temper
Previous: 5 Tempers, plus one per Greater Affix.
Now: 3 Tempers, plus one per Greater Affix.
Scrolls of Restoration no longer restore all temper charges to an item. Instead, they restore 1 temper charge.
There is no limit to the number of times a Scroll of Restoration can be used on an item.
Rare: 10-25 Common Salvage and 2-5 Veiled Crystals.
Legendary: 10-25 Common Salvage, 2-10 Veiled Crystals, and 0-1 Legendary Salvage.
Ancestral Legendary: 40 Common Salvage, 15 Veiled Crystals, 2 Legendary Salvage, and 1 Forgotten Soul.
Rare: 25 Common Salvage and 5 Veiled Crystals.
Legendary: 15 Veiled Crystals and 5 Legendary Salvage.
Ancestral Legendary: 25 Legendary Salvage and 25 Forgotten Souls.
Masterworking has been redesigned. Items have a new stat, Refinement, which is displayed on the item tooltip.
Each time the player Masterworks an item, the refinement value of the item is increased by a random tunable amount (1-3%), up to a Max Refinement Threshold (20%).
Once at the cap, the item is considered Masterworked.
The base properties of an item are scaled by Refinement at a 1:1 bonus.
A Chest item with 100 armor
Refinement 0% = 100 Armor
Refinement 5% = 105 Armor
Refinement 20% = 120 Armor
A Masterworked item can be refined one more time to upgrade an affix to a Greater Affix.
Players may re-roll the Masterworked Greater Affix by spending Neathiron, a returning resource to once again discover in Sanctuary.
The quantity of Obducite you earn has been adjusted. Players will earn 85% less Obducite, and recipes requiring Obducite have been similarly reduced.
Items no longer need to have been tempered to be Masterworked.
The sell value of items has been reduced by 60%.
The gold cost of items has been reduced by 90%.
Healing potions now heal 35% max Life instantly, and no longer grant Healing over Time.
Potions no longer need to be upgraded.
Potion charges will refill once every 30 12 seconds.
Potion Count affix can now be found on leg armor.
"Lesser" Life Regen available on Chest, Helm, Legs, Boots, and Shield.
"Greater" Life Regen available on Amulet, Rings, and Gloves.
Increased healing effectiveness of both.
"Lesser" available on Chest, Helm, Legs, Boots, and Shields.
"Greater" available on Amulet, Rings, Gloves, and Weapons.
Increased healing effectiveness of both.
Re-added to the base affix pool, available on Glove, Weapons, Shields, Amulets, and Rings.
Available on Chest, Helm, Legs, Boots, Amulet, Rings, and Shields.
Increased healing % amount.
The chance to get another Nightmare Dungeon Sigil when completing a Nightmare Dungeon has been reduced. When a Sigil does not drop, Sigil Powder will drop.
Improved loot quality and loot quality scaling as the player climbs Torments and reaches higher tiers within Horadric Strongrooms.
Added a moderate amount of gold, scaling with higher tiers within the Strongroom.
Increased the chance for a Nightmare Escalation Sigil to drop from a Horadric Strongroom.
Reduced the base likelihood of a Strongroom appearing within a Nightmare Dungeon. The likelihood of the Horadric Strongroom affix appearing on a Nightmare Sigil is unchanged.
Duration has been doubled.
Damage has been doubled.
Walls now block player projectiles.
Walls no longer disappear when the associated elite dies.
Radius Increased.
Poison duration significantly increased.
Damage now ramps up the longer you stand in the puddle.
Amount of Totems spawned has been doubled.
Damage significantly increased.
Damage Increased.
Suppressor field is now immediately active when the monster spawns.
The suppressor field now lasts until the monster is killed.
Damage Increased.
Instances of single element resistance affixes can now roll higher values than instances of All Resistance affixes.
A Jeweler and an Occultist have been added to the training grounds.
There is no longer a cost to enter The Pit.
The Pit can now be entered before Level 60. The base pit tier unlocked is now Tier 10.
Maximum Capacity of Murmuring Obols has been increased by 500.
Increased from 30 armor to 250 armor.
Increased from 50 armor to 500 armor.
Decreased from +10% max life to +5% max life.
Decreased from +20% max life to +10% max life.
Updated from 300 flat armor to +10% armor.
Rare tempering manuals now start dropping at level 30 instead of at level 45.
Characters that skip either campaign now unlock all non-stronghold waypoints for their respective region.
All skill slots are now unlocked from level 1.
Progression down the Skill tree is now faster, Core Skills get unlocked after spending one skill point and then the next skill group is unlocked after spending two skill points.
Aether rewards for Chaos Rifts and Chaos Waves in Infernal Hordes have been increased.
Monsters now scale attack speed as difficulty goes up in addition to movement speed.
Tempering affixes now have greater variance now that you aren't limited to how many times you can re-temper.
Resistance and Armor values from affixes have been broadly adjusted to account for the introduction of Toughness.
For more details on Season Rank, please read the section detailing it in the Season of Divine Intervention overview blog here .
Fixed an issue where the Screen Reader did not read the interact buttons during conversations with NPCs when playing on controller.
Fixed an issue where the Screen Reader did not read controller buttons for Upgrading and Reallocating Blessings.
Fixed an issue where Barbarian's Rumble Glyph did not accurately track the number of active Earthquakes.
Fixed an issue where there was no UI indicator for the buff duration for Wrath of the Berserker.
Fixed an issue where the third attack for Iron Maelstrom could occur twice.
Fixed an issue where Ring of Red Furor would occasionally track resources spent inconsistently.
Fixed an issue where the Damage Bonus from Supernatural Blood Surge applied twice to the explosion from Blood-Bathed Aspect.
Fixed an issue where Essence Per Enemy Drained by Blood Surge affix was not properly granting Essence.
Fixed an issue where Rogue's Cunning Stratagem Paragon Node would not increase the damage of non-Core Skills that used Combo Points.
Fixed an issue where Aspect of Quickening Fog did not properly grant both bonuses from Aspect of Synergy.
Fixed an issue with Infiltrator's Aspect where Poison Traps placed before entering Stealth would not properly detonate when exiting Stealth.
Fixed an issue where Ambush did not increase damage when Stun Grenades deal damage with Explosive Verve Aspect equipped.
Fixed an issue where Shadow Clone was not properly benefiting from the increased Penetrating Shot damage from Eaglehorn.
Fixed an issue where Lightning Familiar would not properly trigger the Charged effect from Vyr's Mastery.
Fixed an issue where Barbarian Earthquakes could spawn Chaos Portals in Infernal Hordes.
Fixed an issue where Belial's transition between phases could be delayed if recovering from Stagger during transition.
Fixed an issue where Skeletal Mages could fail to upgrade to Arch-Mages when using the Hand of Naz.
Fixed an issue where hostages during a Hostage event started at half health.
Fixed an issue where activating a Nightmare Dungeon sigil with the Horadric Strongroom affix would also apply that affix to other dungeons.
Fixed an issue where killing the Cannibal Champion too quickly in the Temple of Rot could block Stronghold progression.
Fixed an issue where the fire in the Chapel in Nostrava could cause the player to deal on-hit damage to themselves.
Fixed an issue where some Execute effects could occasionally affect Immune enemies.
Fixed an issue where Ravenous Soulspires and Hellspires could sometimes last indefinitely.
Fixed an issue where Barrier granted by Temerity could be drained by health regeneration from a life per second affix.
Fixed an issue where quest progression could be blocked for Inside the Black Tomb if the player's character was killed by Locran's Fire.
Fixed an issue where the associated item for the Raising Spears quest didn't spawn, which would block quest progression.
Fixed an issue where the Portal when using Leave Dungeon sometimes didn't properly appear.
Fixed an issue where the Stockades Dungeon's gate was inoperable in the Eternal Realm.
Fixed an issue where newly dropped items could despawn when there was a lot of loot on the ground.
Fixed an issue where players on PlayStation™ could not use Trade Chat.
Fixed an issue where some console and Steam achievements for Vessel of Hatred wouldn't unlock properly if the requirements were met before buying the Expansion on console.
Fixed an issue where the Devoted Protector Steam Achievement wouldn't be unlocked when reaching Paragon 300.
Fixed an issue where some previously unlocked titles became unavailable.
Various performance, stability, UI, visual, and audio improvements.
